verses.verse: <WG1161> I commend<WG4921> unto you<WG5213> Phebe<WG5402> our<WG2257> sister,<WG79> which is<WG5607> a servant<WG1249> of the<WG3588> church<WG1577> which<WG3588> is at<WG1722> Cenchrea: <WG2747>

That <WG2443> ye receive<WG4327> her<WG846> in<WG1722> the Lord,<WG2962> as becometh<WG516> saints,<WG40> and<WG2532> that ye assist<WG3936> her<WG846> in<WG1722> whatsoever<WG3739> <WG302> business<WG4229> she hath need<WG5535> of you:<WG5216> for<WG1063> she<WG3778> hath<WG2532> been<WG1096> a succorer<WG4368> of many,<WG4183> and<WG2532> of<WG1700> myself<WG848> also.
Greet <WG782> Priscilla<WG4252> and<WG2532> Aquila<WG207> my<WG3450> helpers<WG4904> in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> Jesus: <WG2424>

Who <WG3748> have for<WG5228> my<WG3450> life<WG5590> laid down<WG5294> their own<WG1438> necks:<WG5137> unto whom<WG3739> not<WG3756> only<WG3441> I<WG1473> give thanks,<WG2168> but<WG235> also<WG2532> all<WG3956> the<WG3588> churches<WG1577> of the<WG3588> Gentiles.<WG1484>

Likewise <WG2532> greet the<WG3588> church<WG1577> that is in<WG2596> their<WG848> house.<WG3624> Salute<WG782> my<WG3450> well-beloved<WG27> Epaenetus,<WG1866> who<WG3739> is<WG2076> the firstfruits<WG536> of Achaia<WG882> unto<WG1519> Christ.<WG5547>
Greet <WG782> Mary,<WG3137> who<WG3748> bestowed much labor<WG2872> <WG4183> on<WG1519> us.<WG2248>

Salute <WG782> Andronicus<WG408> and<WG2532> Junia,<WG2458> my<WG3450> kinsmen,<WG4773> and<WG2532> my<WG3450> fellow prisoners,<WG4869> who<WG3748> are<WG1526> of note<WG1978> among<WG1722> the<WG3588> apostles,<WG652> who<WG3739> also<WG2532> were<WG1096> in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> before<WG4253> me.<WG1700>
Greet <WG782> Amplias<WG291> my<WG3450> beloved<WG27> in<WG1722> the Lord.<WG2962>
Salute <WG782> Urbane,<WG3773> our<WG2257> helper<WG4904> in<WG1722> Christ,<WG5547> and<WG2532> Stachys<WG4720> my<WG3450> beloved.<WG27>
Salute <WG782> Apelles<WG559> approved<WG1384> in<WG1722> Christ.<WG5547> Salute<WG782> them<WG3588> which are of<WG1537> Aristobulus'<WG711> household.
Salute <WG782> Herodion<WG2267> my<WG3450> kinsman.<WG4773> Greet<WG782> them<WG3588> that be of<WG1537> the<WG3588> household of Narcissus,<WG3488> which are<WG5607> in<WG1722> the Lord.<WG2962>

Salute <WG782> Tryphena<WG5170> and<WG2532> Tryphosa,<WG5173> who<WG3588> labor<WG2872> in<WG1722> the Lord.<WG2962> Salute<WG782> the<WG3588> beloved<WG27> Persis,<WG4069> which<WG3748> labored<WG2872> much<WG4183> in<WG1722> the Lord.<WG2962>
Salute <WG782> Rufus<WG4504> chosen<WG1588> in<WG1722> the Lord,<WG2962> and<WG2532> his<WG848> mother<WG3384> and<WG2532> mine.<WG1700>
Salute <WG782> Asyncritus,<WG799> Phlegon,<WG5393> Hermas,<WG2057> Patrobas,<WG3969> Hermes,<WG2060> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> brethren<WG80> which are with<WG4862> them.<WG846>

Salute <WG782> Philologus,<WG5378> and<WG2532> Julia,<WG2456> Nereus,<WG3517> and<WG2532> his<WG848> sister,<WG79> and<WG2532> Olympas,<WG3652> and<WG2532> all<WG3956> the<WG3588> saints<WG40> which are with<WG4862> them.<WG846>
Salute <WG782> one another<WG240> with<WG1722> a holy<WG40> kiss.<WG5370> The<WG3588> churches<WG1577> of Christ<WG5547> salute<WG782> you.<WG5209>

Now <WG1161> I beseech<WG3870> you,<WG5209> brethren,<WG80> mark<WG4648> them which cause<WG4160> divisions<WG1370> and<WG2532> offenses<WG4625> contrary<WG3844> to the<WG3588> doctrine<WG1322> which<WG3739> ye<WG5210> have learned;<WG3129> and<WG2532> avoid<WG1578> <WG575> them.<WG846>

For <WG1063> they that are such<WG5108> serve<WG1398> not<WG3756> our<WG2257> Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ,<WG5547> but<WG235> their own<WG1438> belly;<WG2836> and<WG2532> by<WG1223> good words<WG5542> and<WG2532> fair speeches<WG2129> deceive<WG1818> the<WG3588> hearts<WG2588> of the<WG3588> simple.<WG172>

For <WG1063> your<WG5216> obedience<WG5218> is come abroad<WG864> unto<WG1519> all<WG3956> men. I am glad<WG5463> therefore<WG3767> on your behalf:<WG1909> <WG5213> but<WG1161> yet I would<WG2309> have you<WG5209> wise<WG1511> <WG4680> unto<WG1519> that which is good,<WG18> and<WG1161> simple<WG185> concerning<WG1519> evil.<WG2556>

And <WG1161> the<WG3588> God<WG2316> of peace<WG1515> shall bruise<WG4937> Satan<WG4567> under<WG5259> your<WG2257> feet<WG4228> shortly.<WG1722> <WG5034> The<WG3588> grace<WG5485> of our<WG2257> Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> be with<WG3326> you.<WG5216> Amen.<WG281>
Timothy <WG5095> my<WG3450> workfellow,<WG4904> and<WG2532> Lucius,<WG3066> and<WG2532> Jason,<WG2394> and<WG2532> Sosipater,<WG4989> my<WG3450> kinsmen,<WG4773> salute<WG782> you.<WG5209>
I <WG1473> Tertius,<WG5060> who wrote<WG1125> this epistle,<WG1992> salute<WG782> you<WG5209> in<WG1722> the Lord.<WG2962>

Gaius <WG1050> mine<WG3450> host,<WG3581> and<WG2532> of the<WG3588> whole<WG3650> church,<WG1577> saluteth<WG782> you.<WG5209> Erastus<WG2037> the<WG3588> chamberlain<WG3623> of the<WG3588> city<WG4172> saluteth<WG782> you,<WG5209> and<WG2532> Quartus<WG2890> a brother.<WG80>
The <WG3588> grace<WG5485> of our<WG2257> Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> be with<WG3326> you<WG5216> all.<WG3956> Amen.<WG281>

Now <WG1161> to him that is of power<WG1410> to establish<WG4741> you<WG5209> according<WG2596> to my<WG3450> gospel,<WG2098> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> preaching<WG2782> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ,<WG5547> according<WG2596> to the revelation<WG602> of the mystery,<WG3466> which was kept secret<WG4601> since the world began,<WG5550> <WG166>

But <WG1161> now<WG3568> is made manifest,<WG5319> and<WG5037> by<WG1223> the Scriptures<WG1124> of the prophets,<WG4397> according<WG2596> to the commandment<WG2003> of the<WG3588> everlasting<WG166> God,<WG2316> made known<WG1107> to<WG1519> all<WG3956> nations<WG1484> for<WG1519> the obedience<WG5218> of faith: <WG4102>
To God<WG2316> only<WG3441> wise,<WG4680> be glory<WG1391> through<WG1223> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> forever.<WG1519> <WG165> Amen.<WG281>
